item.rakkys-mirror.mirrors.regular_toolt: Hold right click to return home
item.rakkys-mirror.mirrors.gaze_tooltip: Gaze in the mirror to return home
text.rakkys-mirror.error.not_home_dimens: You cannot teleport outside of your current dimension
text.rakkys-mirror.error.not_enough_expe: You do not have enough experience to teleport
